channel.title: Mass Dmg / Barrage Mass
channel.description:
Hi there.
i've tried to find some tutorials about how to change the time delay on like barrage etc...
like when ur range and want to do barrage u have to wait like 6 seconds until u can barrage and then wait again 2 fire arrows. same with like a wep, u have to wait until u attack. how can i change this "time delay"?
Help please, thank you so much[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2009, 09:08:43 am[/size][hr]bring up my post
